button.crawl.hint: Run the crawler and re-index the site (Attention: it takes a while...)
button.reindex.hint: Read the website now and update the search index
button.truncateindex.hint: The search index will be truncated. You must crawl the site to insert data.
db-pages.title: Title
home.welcome-introtext:
Here is the backend of ahCrawler.

This tool consists of 2 parts:
- Searchindex + search engine
- ressource analyzer

To get it run read the docs, please.
home.cfg.unprotected:
WARNING:
The access to the backend is unprotected!
Go to the config file and below "auth" set values "user" and "password".
profile.label: Short title
profile.urls2crawl: List of start urls of the crawler
profile.includepath: List of regex that need to match to the path
status.emptyindex: The search index is empty. The job to index a website was not startet yet.
status.last_updated.label: Last update
status.indexed_urls.label: indexed URLs
status.indexed_urls24h.label: indexed in the last 24h
status.error_urls.label: urls with errors
status.oldest_updated.label: oldest data in index
profile.searches.empty:
No search was executed yet.
To see some data here, you need to integrate the search in the website.
ressources.overview.intro:
Ressources are all single pages and here linked elements like CSS-, javascript-, image files, external websites and so on.
You can filter by elements and properties to reduce the listed ressources in the table below.
ressources.list.intro: With the button [View] you get an overview of incoming and outgoing links of the selected source.
ressources.empty: No Ressources were found. The job to index the ressources was not started yet.
ressources.hint-manyitems:
I found many entries. To increase the performance I hide the table of found ressources.
You can set more filter limits above or enable displaying the table anyway.
ressources.searchressourceid-hint: Remark: This page is linked in other analysis pages to show details.
ressources.searchurl-hint: Enter a complete url or a part of it (domain, path, filename, extension).
warnings.found-http-errors-hint: Found errors in links and ressources. You should check all of them.
warnings.found-http-warnings-hint: You often get warnings for redirects - so it is normal to have some. You should check them time by time . There could be mutiple redirects pointing to an invalid target at the end.
warnings.found-http-ok-hint: We have good news ... these are the successful requests.
warnings.found-http-todo-hint: There are still open urls that must be analyzed. The scan is still running or was aborted.
warnings.loop-detected: Abort: A loop to the url %s was found.
warnings.legend: Legend of the status codes above.
about.thanks-text:
Yes, there is a lot of work in this project. Without using third party components it would be much more work to realize it.
I want to say thank you to:
about.thanks.medoo:
Medoo
The lightest PHP database framework to accelerate development
about.thanks.pure:
Yahoo Pure.CSS
A set of small, responsive CSS modules that you can use in every web project.
httpcode.-1.label: todo
httpcode.-1.descr: The urls were detected and added but not analyzed yet. This is an internal code only.
httpcode.0.label: not reached
httpcode.0.descr: There is no connection to the target. It can be a network problem, host not found in DNS, no running servive, closed port, problem with SSL.
httpcode.100.label: Information: Continue
httpcode.101.label: Information: Switching Protocols
httpcode.102.label: Information: Processing
httpcode.200.label: Success: OK
httpcode.201.label: Success: Created
httpcode.202.label: Success: Accepted
httpcode.203.label: Success: Non-Authoritative Information
httpcode.204.label: Success: No Content
httpcode.205.label: Success: Reset Content
httpcode.206.label: Success: Partial Content
httpcode.207.label: Success: Multi-Status
httpcode.208.label: Success: Already Reported
httpcode.226.label: Success: I am Used
httpcode.300.label: Redirect: Multiple Choices
httpcode.300.descr: The requested ressource is available in different kinds. The answer contains a list of available kinds. Maybe the location header contains the address of the preferred representation.
httpcode.301.label: Redirect: Moved Permanently
httpcode.301.descr: Die Adresse ist veraltet! Auf die neue Adresse der Ressource wird immer mit GET weitergeleitet. Bei Gelegenheit sollten die Links auf die neue Adresse angepasst werden.
httpcode.302.label: Redirect: Found (Moved Temporarily)
httpcode.302.descr: Die URL wird derzeit mit GET temporär umgeleitet - die alte Adresse bleibt aber gültig.
httpcode.303.label: Redirect: See Other
httpcode.303.descr: Die URL wird  mit GET auf eine neue Adresse umgeleitet.
httpcode.304.label: Redirect: Not Modified
httpcode.304.descr: Der Inhalt der angeforderten Ressource hat sich seit der letzten Abfrage des Clients nicht verändert und wird deshalb nicht übertragen.
httpcode.305.label: Redirect: Use Proxy
httpcode.305.descr: Die Ressource ist nur über einen Proxy erreichbar.
httpcode.305.todo: Der Link funktioniert ggf. nur innerhalb der Firma.
httpcode.306.label: Redirect: (reserviert)
httpcode.306.descr: Veralteter Statuscode. Es wurde für [Switch Proxy] verwendet.
httpcode.307.label: Redirect: Temporary Redirect
httpcode.307.descr: Die URL wird derzeit temporär umgeleitet (Methode wird beibehalten) - die alte Adresse bleibt aber gültig.
httpcode.308.label: Redirect: Permanent Redirect
httpcode.308.descr: Die Adresse ist veraltet! Auf die neue Adresse der Ressource wird mit derselben Methode weitergeleitet.
httpcode.308.todo: Bei Gelegenheit sollten die Links auf die neue Adresse angepasst werden.
httpcode.400.label: Client-Error: Bad Request
httpcode.400.descr: Bad Request - Ungültiger bzw. nicht erlaubter Aufruf.
httpcode.401.label: Client-Error: Unauthorized
httpcode.401.descr: Die Anfrage kann nicht ohne gültige Authentifizierung durchgeführt werden.
httpcode.401.todo: Der Crawler durfte es nicht öffnen. Bitte ggf. im Browser prüfen.
httpcode.402.label: Client-Error: Payment Required
httpcode.403.label: Client-Error: Forbidden
httpcode.403.descr: Die Anfrage wurde mangels Berechtigung des Clients nicht durchgeführt. Z.B. war das Login falsch, der User ist nicht berechtigt oder es gibt eine IP-Beschränkung.
httpcode.404.label: Client-Error: Nicht gefunden
httpcode.404.descr: Toter Link. Die angeforderte Ressource wurde nicht gefunden. Dieser Statuscode kann ebenfalls verwendet werden, um eine Anfrage ohne näheren Grund abzuweisen.
httpcode.404.todo: Der Link auf diese Ressource muss korrigiert werden.
httpcode.405.label: Client-Error: Method Not Allowed
httpcode.406.label: Client-Error: Not Acceptable
httpcode.407.label: Client-Error: Proxy Authentication Required
httpcode.408.label: Client-Error: Request Time-out
httpcode.408.descr: Innerhalb der vom Server erlaubten Zeitspanne wurde keine vollständige Anfrage des Clients empfangen.
httpcode.409.label: Client-Error: Conflict
httpcode.410.label: Client-Error: Gone
httpcode.410.descr: Toter Link. Die angeforderte Ressource wird nicht länger bereitgestellt und wurde dauerhaft entfernt.
httpcode.411.label: Client-Error: Length Required
httpcode.412.label: Client-Error: Precondition Failed
httpcode.413.label: Client-Error: Request Entity Too Large
httpcode.414.label: Client-Error: Request-URL Too Long
httpcode.415.label: Client-Error: Unsupported Media Type
httpcode.416.label: Client-Error: Requested range not satisfiable
httpcode.417.label: Client-Error: Expectation Failed
httpcode.418.label: Client-Error: I am a teapot
httpcode.420.label: Client-Error: Policy Not Fulfilled
httpcode.421.label: Client-Error: Misdirected Request
httpcode.422.label: Client-Error: Unprocessable Entity
httpcode.423.label: Client-Error: Locked
httpcode.424.label: Client-Error: Failed Dependency
httpcode.425.label: Client-Error: Unordered Collection
httpcode.426.label: Client-Error: Upgrade Required
httpcode.428.label: Client-Error: Precondition Required
httpcode.429.label: Client-Error: Too Many Requests
httpcode.431.label: Client-Error: Request Header Fields Too Large
httpcode.451.label: Client-Error: Unavailable For Legal Reasons
httpcode.444.label: propriatary client error: No Response
httpcode.449.label: propriatary client error: The request should be retried after doing the appropriate action
httpcode.499.label: propriatary client error: Client Closed Request
httpcode.500.label: Server-Error: Internal Server Error
httpcode.500.descr: Der Server hat ein Problem bei der Verarbeitung. Ggf. ein Ressourcen-Problem oder Programmierfehler. Später noch einmal versuchen.
httpcode.501.label: Server-Error: Not Implemented
httpcode.502.label: Server-Error: Bad Gateway
httpcode.503.label: Server-Error: Service Unavailable
httpcode.504.label: Server-Error: Gateway Time-out
httpcode.505.label: Server-Error: HTTP Version not supported
httpcode.506.label: Server-Error: Variant Also Negotiates
httpcode.507.label: Server-Error: Insufficient Storage
httpcode.508.label: Server-Error: Loop Detected
httpcode.509.label: Server-Error: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded
httpcode.510.label: Server-Error: Not Extended
httpcode.511.label: Server-Error: Network Authentication Required
httpcode.???.label: Proprietary
httpcode.???.descr: This Statuscode doeas not exist officially and is not noted in RFC. It can have any meaning ... can be any error.
